text: Mark-Jan Fledderus (born 14 December 1982 in Coevorden, Drenthe) is a Dutch retired footballer who mainly played as a midfielder. ==Club career== A free- kick specialist, the left-sided midfielder made his professional debut for SC Heerenveen and played for Stormvogels Telstar and FC Groningen before joining Roda JC Kerkrade on a free in 2011.Mark-Jan Fledderus naar Roda JC - Tubantia He returned to his former team Heracles in 2014.Fledderus na drie jaar terug bij Heracles Almelo - Voetbal International Fledderus retired from playing football in summer 2017 and joined Heracles' board of directors as an assistant to general manager Nico Jan Hoogma.Fledderus stopt als voetballer en gaat verder in directie Heracles - AD ==References== ==External links== * Voetbal International profile Category:1982 births Category:Living people Category:People from Coevorden Category:Association football midfielders Category:Dutch footballers Category:FC Groningen players Category:SC Heerenveen players Category:SC Telstar players Category:Heracles Almelo players Category:Roda JC Kerkrade players Category:Eredivisie players Category:Eerste Divisie players
title: Mark-Jan Fledderus
